trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control redistributes space between rows or between columns.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項間距之間的資料列或資料行之間。

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個列舉來設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the values of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment*>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment*>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth*>, and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight*> properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 根據的值重新分配間距<> *>， <> </> *>， <> </> *>，並<> *> 的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>，空間資料行之間重新分配。</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between rows.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>設為<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>，資料列之間的空間就會重新分配。</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between columns: - The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: -如果下列條件成立，重新分配資料行之間的間距:-<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>設為<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> is less than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>.

- If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between rows: - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: -如果下列條件成立，重新分配資料列之間的間距:-<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>設為<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>
重新分配資料行之間的間距。
重新分配資料列之間的間距。
